mutants.code:
import re

def replace_python_with_programming(text):
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = text.strip()
    if re.search('\\bpython\\b', text, re.IGNORECASE):
        text = re.sub('\\bpython\\b', 'Programming', text, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return text

import re

def replace_python_with_programming(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text)
    text = text.strip()
    if re.search('\\bpython\\b', text, re.IGNORECASE):
        text = re.sub('\\bpython\\b', 'Programming', text, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return text

import re

def replace_python_with_programming(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text)
    text = text.strip()
    if re.search('', text, re.IGNORECASE):
        text = re.sub('\\bpython\\b', 'Programming', text, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return text

import re

def replace_python_with_programming(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text)
    text = text.strip()
    if re.search('\\bpython\\b', text, re.IGNORECASE):
        text = re.sub('\\bpython\\b', '', text, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
